extracted_information: The web content provides a comprehensive analysis indicating that dropshipping is not saturated in 2025, despite increased competition. It highlights that success depends on differentiation, adaptation, and strategic approaches, supported by various statistical data and future trends. Dropshipping is presented as a viable and profitable business model.

features.name: Market Saturation Definition
features.description: Market saturation occurs when most prospective customers in a market already use a product/service, indicating demand is satisfied. For dropshipping, it would mean the business model itself is dead, which the article refutes.

features.name: Dropshipping as a Fulfillment Method
features.description: Dropshipping is a merchandising fulfillment method with decades of history, not inherently subject to saturation.

features.name: Market Dynamics
features.description: Markets are dynamic and constantly changing due to factors like technology and trends.

features.name: Viability and Profitability
features.description: Dropshipping is still a viable and profitable business model.

statistics.emerging_markets_economic_value: 22 trillion USD (1.5 times China's GDP alone)
statistics.children_mobile_phone_ownership_us: Over half of US children have a cell phone by age 11
statistics.us_m_commerce_sales_growth: More than doubled in 2022 compared to 2019
